selected_quotes: First biosimilar drug set to enter US market : Patient advocates hope that biosimilars can reduce drug costs
First biosimilar drug - filgrastim - set to enter US market. A case study for future biosimilars @nature @NatureNews
FDA is poised to allow biosimilars, cheaper versions of complex biological drugs used to treat, for example, cancer
US FDA poised to approve its first biosimilar (generic biologic drug), but still hurdles to overcome

news.summary: For years, drug makers have feared the onslaught of competition from “biosimilars,” the generic version of drugs that are made by living organisms. That moment came last week when the FDA approved Novartis’s Zarxio, a near copy of Amgen’s blood cancer drug
